mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(empNo, pwd, name, thumbnail, birth, email, addr, tel, enabled, register_date, modify_date, failure_cnt) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{thumbnail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{tel}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
INSERT INTO person_record(pRecordNum, state, reg_date, rankNo, empNo, depNo, posNo, teamNo) VALUES (#{pRecordNum}, #{state}, SYSDATE, #{rankNo}, #{empNo}, #{depNo}, #{posNo}, #{teamNo})
mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO employee(empNo, pwd, name, thumbnail, birth, email, addr, tel, enabled, register_date, modify_date, failure_cnt, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{thumbnail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{tel}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{startDate}, #{endDate}) INTO person_record(pRecordNum, state, reg_date, rankNo, empNo, depNo, posNo, teamNo) VALUES (pRecord_seq.NEXTVAL, 1, SYSDATE, #{rankNo}, #{empNo}, #{depNo}, #{posNo}, #{teamNo}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT e.empNo, name, pwd, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, addr, enabled, failure_cnt, startDate, endDate, register_date, modify_date, last_login, pr.depNo, d.depName, pr.posNo, p.posName, pr.rankNo, r.rankName, pr.teamNo, t.teamName FROM employee e JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON pr.depNo = d.depNo JOIN position p ON pr.posNo = p.posNo JOIN rank r ON pr.rankNo = r.rankNo JOIN team t ON pr.teamNo = t.teamNo WHERE e.empNo = #{empNo} AND pr.state = 1

SELECT e.empNo, name, pwd, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, addr, enabled, failure_cnt, startDate, endDate, register_date, modify_date, last_login, pr.depNo, d.depName, pr.posNo, p.posName, pr.rankNo, r.rankName, pr.teamNo, t.teamName FROM employee e JOIN person_record pr ON e.empNo = pr.empNo JOIN department d ON pr.depNo = d.depNo JOIN position p ON pr.posNo = p.posNo JOIN rank r ON pr.rankNo = r.rankNo JOIN team t ON pr.teamNo = t.teamNo
AND pr.state = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE empNo=#{empNo}
UPDATE employee SET pwd=#{pwd}, modify_date=SYSDATE WHERE empNo=#{empNo}
